title: Refreshed and Rejuvenated, Thanks to Who?
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Good morning~, Emma-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh!? You’re up already, Kanata-chan? I was going to wake you up in a little bit….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Well~, Kanata just felt so awake, so~. It’s all thanks to Emma-chan~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Did I do something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Last night, you sang Kanata a lullaby, remember?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, that’s right. You fell asleep in the middle of it, Kanata-chan. Your breathing sounded like you felt really good<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah~, Kanata fell asleep in mere seconds…. But, it felt great~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, then I’m glad. I’ll sing for you again sometimes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Actually, Kanata thinks that if Kanata enjoys your lullaby alone, it will be a great loss for humanity, Emma-chan…. So, Emma-chan! Kanata wants to record your lullaby and have it available for anyone to listen to whenever they want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeh~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
